definitions.body: :Is 45:23 Knee (As. birku COT:Gloss; Eth. brk: Aram. [[בֶּרֶךְ]] bruwk) Is 45:23; du. [[בִּרְכַּיִם]] Job 3:12 + 10 t.; sf. [[בִּרְכַּי]] etc. Ge 30:3 + 11 t.;—knee, knees: [[מים ברכים]] water reaching to the knees Ez Eze 47:4; [[וַתְּנִיעֵנִי על ברכי]] Da 10:10; [[יַכְּכָה בשׁחין רע על]] [[הברכים]] De 28:35; [[כרע על ברכים]] kneel on knees in worship 1Ki 8:54, Ezr 9:5 cf. Is 45:23, 1Ki 19:18, 2Ch 6:13, in entreaty 2Ki 1:13, to drink of a fountain Ju Jdg 7:5, Jdg 7:6; [[שׂם פניו בין ברכיו]] put his face between his knees in prayer 1Ki 18:42; [[על ברכים]] upon the knees, Ge 30:3 (E; on ´[[תֵּלֵד עַל ב]] v. Ploss:Das Weib Aufi. 2. ii. 180 ff. Sta:ZAW 1886, 143 ff.) Ge 50:23 (E) Job 3:12, Ju Jdg 16:10, 2Ki 4:20, Is 66:12; [[הוחיא מעם ברכים]] Ge 48:12 (E); knees as seat of strength, weak from terror Job 4:4, Is 35:3, Ez Eze 7:17, Eze 21:12, Na 2:11; or fasting Ps 109:24.
